messages.message:
As someone who's not so familiar with the review UI... I land on this page from the Deployments > Run tab. The title says, "Run: <run id>", which doesn't give much info. I'm pretty lost on what I'm supposed to do... Based on the blue button "mark the document as reviewed", I guess I'm supposed to review the document?
Some possible solutions:
1. Update the title to say "Run result of <run id>, ran at <date/time>"
2. Provide some instructions / modal popups with hints like: "This is the result of your run. Check the result and if anything looks wrong, you can edit it.".
This is moving towards a larger direction id like to explore that would move all reviewing to the review dashboard and opening up result runs as just seeing the results of a run.
@jack.robbins Maybe i can grab time on your calendar later this week about this?
the two are so intertwined right now that its confusing to know where to do what
thanks - cc @Natasha who's working on https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-2403 to improve the clarity of these CTAs
@Udit yes that'd be great, please also include Natasha as we're currently designing solutions to make this process a lot clearer
Great to know that we are working on this already! Thanks team
